text: how much will already named Arnold two
and two-thirds cups thank you there are
two steps to measuring flour precisely
spooning and sweeping let me show you
what I mean by this baking is all about
precision so instead of dipping your cup
into the container of flour use a spoon
to scoop it into the cup pile it
slightly over the top this prevents the
flour from being compacted and ensures
that the cup is completely filled
without any gaps just sweep it off you
use the straight edge of a knife or a
spatula right over the rim to level it
off sweeping the excess flour right back
into the original container another
really good thing to remember when
you're measuring dry ingredients flour
especially is to use these dry measuring
cups liquid measuring cups you won't get
as precise of measurement hi guys thanks
for watching this video be sure to click
